device.title: Device Filter
device.description: When the filter mode is Exclude, the devices that have been checked in the device list will not be accessed; when the filter mode is Include, only the devices that have been checked in the device list will be accessed.

entity_device_selector.title: Select Device
entity_device_selector.description: Please select the device to be operated

entity_filter.title: Entity Filter
entity_filter.description: When the filter mode is Exclude, the devices that have been checked in the device list will not be accessed; when the filter mode is Include, only the devices that have been checked in the device list will be accessed.
